Properties.GroupDescription: Allow access to things on the VPC

InstanceType.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

InstanceTypeP4D.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid EC2 instance type.

EnvironmentType.Description: [Required]:: Type of Environment to deploy: [Production]: Ready for preexisting Public Route53 Zone and Elastic IP Services. [Evaluation]: Ready for Software Evaluation at minimal costs. [Development]: Ready for Stack modifications.
EnvironmentType.ConstraintDescription: Must specify Production, Evaluation, or Development.

RegistrationEMailAddress.Description: [Required]:: Your EMail Address used for License and Registration of Perforce Helix Software and Services
RegistrationEMailAddress.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid EMail Address

KeyName.Description: [Required]:: Name of an EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access to the instance.
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

SSHLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be usedto access the web server using SSH.
SSHLocation.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

P4DSuperPass.Description: [Required]:: The P4D Super account password, 8 to 1024 characters in length

SiteName.Description: [Production]:: *The DNS short name for an existing Amazon Route53 Domain | [Evaluation]: Leave empty. | [Development]: Leave empty. | [Example]: helix-cloud

HostedZone.Description: [Production]:: *The Domain of an pre-existing Amazon Route53 hosted zone. | [Evaluation]: Leave empty. | [Development]: Leave empty. | [Example]: perforce.com
HostedZone.ConstraintDescription: Production:: Must be a valid Public Domain that is available in Route53 | Evaluation: NULL | Development: NULL

PublicIp.Description: Public IP Address for your Deployment.

PublicDnsMainInstance.Description: Public Domain Name for your deployment.
